commentaries.alert.should_log_in: You must be logged in to like a review.
commentaries.modal.title: Are you sure you want to delete this review?
following.no_comments: This user doesn't have any review.
footer.tos: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
footer.tutorial.step_1: Welcome to Game-Critic! Here you can easily discover and rate video games.
footer.tutorial.step_2: Use the search bar to find video games or users quickly.
footer.tutorial.step_3: Browse categories to discover games by genre or new releases.
footer.tutorial.step_4: Click on a game to view its profile, read reviews and add your own rating.
footer.tutorial.step_5: Follow other users and check their ratings from the "Following" section.

welcome.description: Game-Critic is the ultimate portal for video game lovers looking for in-depth analysis, unbiased reviews and expert ratings. From the latest releases to timeless classics, here you'll find informed opinions on graphics, gameplay, story and more.
